articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Pence says Trump conduct around 2021 Capitol attack was reckless but not criminal
articles.description: Former U.S. vice president and Republican presidential candidate Mike Pence said on Sunday he felt former President Donald Trump's words and actions leading up to the Capitol attacks on Jan. 6, 2021, were reckless though not likely criminal.

articles.title: Former Brazilian President Bolsonaro fading from the spotlight
articles.description: Jair Bolsonaro was once called the “Trump of the Tropics."
articles.content:
A clear demonstration of Bolsonaro’s waning power was a tax reform vote in Congress’ lower house this month.

articles.title: Oppenheimer joins the ranks of Wolf of Wall Street. A biopic that lionises the hero, no warts

articles.title: Nervous Republicans turn to New Hampshire in hopes of stopping former President Trump
